    Scene_Properties - Class in com.example.demo.Scene_Manipulator
    Abstract class that defines the properties and behaviors for a game scene.
    Scene_Properties(String, double, double, int) - Constructor for class com.example.demo.Scene_Manipulator.Scene_Properties
    Constructor that initializes the basic properties of the game scene, including background, user plane, and game elements such as friendly and enemy units, projectiles, and pause settings.
